description: Extension scaffolding and activation

steps.text: Run 'yo code' or manually create extension structure with package.json, tsconfig.json, and src folder
Define extension activation events in package.json (onView, workspaceContains:prd.json)
Create extension entry point that registers all commands and views
Run extension in Extension Development Host
Verify extension activates without errors in Output panel

description: PRD file detection and loading

steps.text: Open a workspace containing a prd.json file in the plans/ folder
Verify extension detects and loads the prd.json file automatically
Verify items are parsed correctly with all fields (id, category, description, steps, status, passes)
Modify prd.json externally and verify extension reloads changes
Verify error handling when prd.json is malformed

description: Sidebar tree view displays PRD items

steps.text: Open a workspace with a valid prd.json
Verify a 'Ralph' or 'PRD' view appears in the Activity Bar
Click the Activity Bar icon to open the sidebar
Verify all PRD items are listed with their descriptions
Verify items are grouped or labeled by category (setup, ui, functional, git, agent)

description: Sidebar shows status indicators for each item

steps.text: Open the sidebar with PRD items loaded
Verify each item displays a status icon (not-started, in-progress, in-review, completed)
Verify different statuses have visually distinct icons or colors
Change an item's status in prd.json manually
Verify the sidebar updates to reflect the new status

description: Detail panel opens when selecting a sidebar item

steps.text: Click on a PRD item in the sidebar
Verify a webview panel opens showing item details
Verify the panel displays: id, category, description, status, passes, and all steps
Verify each step has a checkbox showing its completion state
Click a different item in sidebar and verify panel updates

description: Drag-and-drop reordering in sidebar

steps.text: Open the sidebar with multiple PRD items
Drag an item from one position to another
Verify the item moves to the new position visually
Verify prd.json is updated with the new order
Reload the extension and verify order persists

description: Add new PRD item

steps.text: Click the 'Add Item' button in the sidebar toolbar
Verify a form/dialog appears with fields: category, description
Fill in the form and submit
Verify the new item appears in the sidebar with auto-generated ID
Verify prd.json is updated with the new item (status: not-started, passes: false, empty steps)

description: Edit existing PRD item

steps.text: Select an item in the sidebar
Click 'Edit' button or use context menu
Verify form/dialog opens pre-filled with current values
Modify description and category
Submit and verify changes appear in sidebar and prd.json

description: Delete PRD item

steps.text: Select an item in the sidebar
Click 'Delete' button or use context menu
Verify confirmation dialog appears
Confirm deletion
Verify item is removed from sidebar and prd.json

description: Add, edit, and remove steps within an item

steps.text: Open the detail panel for an item
Click 'Add Step' and enter step text
Verify step appears in the list
Click 'Edit' button on a step to edit its text
Click delete icon on a step to remove it
Verify all changes persist to prd.json

description: Toggle step completion checkboxes

steps.text: Open the detail panel for an item with steps
Click a step's checkbox to mark it complete
Verify checkbox shows checked state
Verify step completion state persists to prd.json (steps become objects with text and completed fields)
Uncheck the step and verify state updates

description: Change item status from detail panel

steps.text: Open the detail panel for an item
Locate the status dropdown/selector
Change status from 'not-started' to 'in-progress'
Verify sidebar icon updates immediately
Verify prd.json status field is updated

description: Toggle passes field from detail panel

steps.text: Open the detail panel for an item
Locate the 'passes' toggle/checkbox
Toggle from false to true
Verify visual indicator updates (e.g., green checkmark)
Verify prd.json passes field is updated

description: Auto-generate unique IDs for new items

steps.text: Create a new PRD item
Verify an ID is auto-generated in format 'category-XXX' (e.g., 'ui-005')
Create another item in the same category
Verify the new ID increments correctly
Verify no duplicate IDs exist in prd.json

description: Create feature branch when starting work on an item
steps: Select an item with status 'not-started'
Click 'Start Work' button
Verify a new git branch is created (e.g., 'feature/setup-001')
Verify the workspace switches to the new branch
Verify item status changes to 'in-progress'

description: Track changed files for in-progress item

steps.text: Start work on an item (creates feature branch)
Make changes to files in the workspace
Open the detail panel for the in-progress item
Verify a 'Changed Files' section shows modified files
Verify the list updates as more files are changed

description: View diff of changed file using VS Code native diff

steps.text: With an in-progress item that has changed files
Click on a file in the 'Changed Files' list
Verify VS Code opens the native diff view
Verify diff shows changes between feature branch and main
Verify both sides of the diff are scrollable and navigable

description: Mark item for review and show all diffs

steps.text: With an in-progress item that has changed files
Click 'Submit for Review' button
Verify item status changes to 'in-review'
Verify all changed files are listed in the detail panel
Verify user can click through each file to review diffs

description: Auto-merge feature branch when item status changes to completed
steps: With an item in 'in-review' status on a feature branch
Change status to 'completed' in the detail panel
Verify confirmation dialog appears explaining the merge operation
Confirm the merge
Verify feature branch is merged into main
Verify changes are pushed to remote
Verify feature branch is deleted locally
Verify workspace switches back to main branch
Verify success message shows merge details

description: Start Work triggers Copilot chat with item context

steps.text: Select a PRD item and click 'Start Work'
Verify GitHub Copilot Chat opens (or extension chat panel)
Verify the chat is pre-populated with context about the item
Verify context includes: description, steps, category, and relevant workspace info
Verify agent can reference the PRD item in responses

description: Agent receives project prompt template
steps: Start work on an item
Verify the agent context includes the appropriate prompt from prompts/ folder
Verify prompt is selected based on item category or project configuration
Verify agent responses align with the prompt's instructions
Test with different prompt templates (default.txt, safe-write-only.txt)

description: Agent can update step completion status

steps.text: Start work on an item with the agent
As agent completes implementation steps, verify it can mark steps complete
Verify step checkboxes update in the detail panel
Verify prd.json is updated with step completion
Verify user can also manually override step status

description: Agent uses skill references for context

steps.text: Start work on an item related to WordPress plugin development
Verify agent has access to skills/wp-plugin-development/SKILL.md
Verify agent references the skill's references/ documents when relevant
Ask agent about WordPress security best practices
Verify response incorporates content from security.md reference

description: Filter items by status in sidebar
steps: Open the sidebar with multiple items in different statuses
Click filter dropdown or toggle buttons
Select 'In Progress' filter
Verify only in-progress items are shown
Clear filter and verify all items return

description: Filter items by category in sidebar
steps: Open the sidebar with items in multiple categories
Click category filter dropdown
Select 'ui' category
Verify only UI category items are shown
Select multiple categories and verify combined results

description: Keyboard shortcuts for common actions

steps.text: With sidebar focused, press 'n' or configured shortcut
Verify 'Add Item' dialog opens
With item selected, press 'Enter'
Verify detail panel opens
Press 'Delete' key and verify delete confirmation appears

description: Progress summary in sidebar header

steps.text: Open sidebar with items in various statuses
Verify header shows progress summary (e.g., '3/10 completed')
Complete an item
Verify progress summary updates immediately
Verify progress bar or percentage indicator reflects completion

description: The user cannot add steps to a new PRD item via the UI. The add steps button is present, as in the steps area in the UI, but they dont seem to work. Clicking the + Add Step button appears to do nothing. Please address this issue

steps.text: Identify the issue in the add step button handler
Check event listeners and DOM manipulation code
Fix the step addition logic in the UI component
Test the add step functionality in the detail panel
Verify no regressions introduced by the fix

description: There appears to be two buttons that add a new PRD item. the first is "Add PRD Item (N)" and the second "Create PRD Item". Both appear to do the same thing, but only one is required. Please fix this issue.

I'd like to audit the project to determine where the codebase could be polished to improve its maintainablity. please perform an audit and create an audit report in a .reports folder for me to review. This report will likely inform additional items being added to the prd.json so consider that when creating the report.

PRD work items and steps should each start a new Copilot chat session instead of appending to the current one. This avoids blowing the context window. Each PRD item and each step within it should start a fresh chat session with sufficient context to continue from the previous step.
Build a new version of the extension so I can share it with others
Update docs so anyone installing and using the extension has a clear overview of what the extensions does, how to use it, what's required to use it, and how to set things up.
Split detailPanel.ts into modules

steps.text: Extract HTML generation to separate htmlRenderer.ts module
Extract message handlers to messageHandlers.ts module
Extract git operations to gitOperations.ts module
Extract step management to stepManager.ts module
Update detailPanel.ts to import and use new modules
Test all functionality to ensure refactoring didn't break anything

description: Create PrdFileManager service

steps.text: Create new PrdFileManager class to abstract file operations
Add methods for read, write, update operations with error handling
Add transaction-like operations for atomic PRD updates
Implement file backup/recovery mechanism
Update prdTreeDataProvider to use PrdFileManager
Update detailPanel to use PrdFileManager
Add unit tests for PrdFileManager

description: Extract configuration management

steps.text: Define VS Code workspace configuration schema for categories
Define configuration for PRD file path
Define configuration for permission profiles
Move hardcoded values from extension.ts to configuration
Move hardcoded values from prdTreeDataProvider.ts to configuration
Add migration logic for existing users
Document configuration options in README

description: Add constants and enums

steps.text: Create constants.ts file for all magic strings
Define enum for status values (not-started, in-progress, completed, etc.)
Define enum for message commands (toggleStep, changeStatus, etc.)
Define constants for categories
Replace all magic strings throughout codebase with constants
Verify no compilation errors after replacement

description: Set up testing infrastructure

steps.text: Install Mocha test framework and dependencies
Configure VS Code test runner in package.json
Create test folder structure (unit, integration)
Set up test utilities and mocks for VS Code API
Add npm test script to package.json
Document how to run tests in README
Verify tests run successfully in CI environment

description: Add unit tests for PRD operations

steps.text: Write tests for PRD item CRUD operations
Write tests for ID generation logic
Write tests for step management
Write tests for status transitions
Mock file system operations for isolated testing
Achieve at least 70% code coverage for core logic
Run tests and verify all pass

description: Add integration tests

steps.text: Write test for extension activation
Write test for command registration and execution
Write test for tree view rendering
Write test for detail panel interactions
Write test for file watcher behavior
Run integration tests in Extension Development Host
Verify all tests pass consistently

description: Add logging infrastructure

steps.text: Create Logger class using VS Code OutputChannel
Add log levels (debug, info, warn, error)
Add timestamps to log entries
Log key operations (file changes, git operations, command execution)
Add debug mode configuration option
Replace console.log statements with logger calls
Document logging in README for troubleshooting

description: Improve error handling

steps.text: Create custom error types for domain-specific errors
Standardize error handling pattern across all modules
Add try-catch blocks to all file operations
Add try-catch blocks to all git operations
Provide user-friendly error messages with actionable suggestions
Log all errors to OutputChannel for debugging
Test error scenarios to ensure graceful degradation

description: Add JSDoc documentation

steps.text: Document all public APIs in extension.ts
Document all public methods in prdTreeDataProvider.ts
Document all public methods in detailPanel.ts
Add parameter descriptions and return types
Add examples for complex functions
Document expected behavior and edge cases
Generate documentation with TypeDoc (optional)

description: Add input validation

steps.text: Install Zod or similar validation library
Define schema for PRD item structure
Define schema for step structure
Validate PRD file content on load
Validate user inputs for ID, description, category
Add validation error messages for users
Test with malformed PRD files and invalid inputs

description: Enhance webview security

steps.text: Review and strengthen Content Security Policy
Sanitize all user inputs before rendering in webview
Use nonce for inline scripts and styles
Validate all messages from webview before processing
Audit for potential XSS vulnerabilities
Test with malicious inputs to verify security
Document security measures in code comments

description: review the applicaiton and make sure its in good working order
Fix test runner configuration issues

steps.text: Investigate reported test runner configuration issues
Check .mocharc.json and test configuration files for errors
Verify test runner works with pnpm test command
Update documentation if configuration needs to be adjusted
Run full test suite to ensure all tests pass

description: Replace console.log statements with logger utility

steps.text: Audit codebase to find all console.log statements
Identify which statements should use the logger module instead
Replace console.log calls with appropriate logger.* methods
Verify logger configuration and output formatting
Test logging output in development and debug modes

description: Update dependencies to latest available versions

steps.text: Run 'pnpm outdated' to identify available dependency updates
Review changelog and breaking changes for each update
Update package.json and lock file with latest compatible versions
Run full test suite and build process after updates
Verify no regressions from dependency updates

description: Implement PRD item archiving system to keep prd.json lean by moving completed items to dated archive files

steps.text: Design archiving system: completed items â†’ prd-archive-<YYYY-MM-DD>.json files
Create archiveManager module to handle archive file operations
Implement function to identify completable items (status: completed AND passes: true)
Implement function to extract completable items from prd.json
Implement function to save extracted items to prd-archive-<date>.json

description: Add UI command to archive completed PRD items

steps.text: Add 'Archive Completed Items' command to package.json contributions
Implement command handler that calls archiveManager.archiveCompleted()
Show success message with count of archived items and archive file name
Reload PRD tree to reflect removed archived items
Add command shortcut or menu option in PRD tree context menu

description: Add archiving options and configuration settings

steps.text: Add configuration setting for auto-archive on extension exit
Add configuration setting for archive retention policy (days to keep)
Implement auto-cleanup of old archive files based on retention setting
Add option to archive items manually via command palette
Document archiving feature in README with examples

description: Add tests for PRD item archiving functionality

steps.text: Create test file for archiveManager module
Write tests for identifying completed items
Write tests for archive file creation and naming
Write tests for archive file content validation
Add integration tests for archiving workflow end-to-end

description: Add PRD run-loop manager to iterate across items

steps.text: Design a queue builder that filters items by status/category
Implement run-loop manager that processes items sequentially
Update PRD item status to in-progress when processing starts
Advance to next item on completion or failure with logging
Persist any status/step updates back to prd.json

description: Add Run PRD Queue command with loop options

steps.text: Add command contribution and command registration
Prompt for iterations per item, status filter, and category filter
Wire command to run-loop manager
Show progress UI with current item and iteration count
Handle user cancelation gracefully

description: Detect completion per item and auto-advance

steps.text: Implement completion detection (token, status, or steps complete)
Mark item passes=true when completion is detected
Mark item status=completed and refresh the tree
Record completion in progress.txt
Advance to next item automatically

description: Add tests for PRD run-loop and queue execution

steps.text: Add unit tests for queue filtering and ordering
Add unit tests for completion detection logic
Add integration test for run-loop command end-to-end
Verify cancellation behavior stops the loop
